text: Sounds of Nature ( 天籁 ) is a work for unconventional Instruments (seven performers), composed by He Xuntian in 1986. ==Summary== He Xuntian adopted RD Composition in his work Sounds of Nature. The work won The Outstanding Musical Achievement Award of The International New Music Composers Competition 1989-90 USA. ==Performance== Sounds of Nature, He Xuntian Symphony Works Concert 1988 Dirigent: He Xuntian Sounds of Nature Ensemble 30\. November 1988, Beijing Concert Hall, Beijing ==References== Category:Compositions by He Xuntian Category:Compositions for chamber orchestra Category:1986 compositions
title: Sounds of Nature
